- [Assignment extension form.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd3E1IO00dQ4fGtnPWIrdG3aJMZSqkOJiz6Iy94MvYM98nNyw/viewform?usp=sf_link) If you are experiencing an exceptional circumstance that may warrant an extension, use this to request one.
- [Regrade request form.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdK6oLCneiZAMdDY_4T6xx2cTz33v5V9IU9Hpxxti3ZsBTKrw/viewform?usp=sf_link) If you think we have graded something wrong, you can report it on this form. Responses are only accepted for within 72 hours of grade post.
- [Excused absence form.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScKMw0mnt4gTa9NZhYZpYWwIexfmpqSp76rjVtsbJ4D4AfPxw/viewform?usp=sf_link) To request an excused absence from lecture or discussion.
